subtitle.1: I'm a website developer at Sprout Digital Lab, a startup based in Indonesia. I also write tips about web development on

footer.score: SEO score by Google PageSpeed API may miss key factors like Core Web Vitals. Run Lighthouse manually for more accuracy.

description.landing-seller: A promotional one-pager for a Toco Ecommerce. Clean layout with list of benefits to join as seller at Toco and contact me for more information form
description.landing-community: Introducing the Toco Community feature with a vibrant one-pager that breaks down how users can connect, engage, and grow within the platform. Includes a CTA button to join the community, all wrapped in a visually appealing interface.
description.landing-premium: Showcases the exclusive features of Toco Premium for sellersâ€”boosted visibility, better tools, and more perks. Designed to convey value at a glance and convert curious users into premium members.
description.landing-tocoffee: Featuring a digital menu, cozy vibes through visuals, and a built-in reservation form, itâ€™s a perfect mix of functionality and brand storytelling for a local gem in BSD, Indonesia.
description.toco: Toco.id is E-commerce that base on community, Toco Marketplace to sell and buy products and connected directly to consumer, Toco Classified for advertising your secondhand or unique products
description.seller: Manage your products and orders on Toco Seller Dashboard, beyond that manage your profile setting, payment method, and logistic options. Become premium seller unlocking customize page for your store
description.myhc: Built a comprehensive clinic management platform to streamline patient registration, billing, and medical records. Integrated a real-time queue management system with automated alerts for both in-patient and out-patient appointments. Also implemented appointment reminders via email and SMS, significantly reducing no-shows and improving clinic efficiency.
description.dontia: A full-featured telemedicine web app built with Vue.js, Nuxt, and Pinia. Patients can schedule appointments, consult with doctors via Twilio-powered video calls, and access a personalized health dashboard to view medical history, upcoming visits, and track prescriptions â€” all in one seamless experience.
